tasks.task: Contribute to food security and children's education in Zimbabwe through an IAEA-FAO project.
subtasks: Calculate precise water and fertilizer needs using isotopic techniques
Increase crop yields (e.g., from 5-6 tons/ha to nearly triple)
Improve household income to afford school fees
Help farmers in various African countries
Highlight environmental benefits (reduced water use, improved food security)
Disregard irrelevant technical terms and urban planning references
